name: Ore Gobbler
description:
Mine ores to make sparklers to sell for money! As as entrepreneur you strive to gain as much money as possible, but neglected to notice that you have set up camp over the graves of many miners before you. Although the corpses are valuable they contain the ghosts of the miners hell-bent on destroying you for waking them up from their slumber. Their only weakness… sparklers. You will have to balance sparkler production of protection and profit, and upgrade yourself and your sparklers so you can withstand the more valuable but more dangerous depths below.

A hit new game from the creators of Theresa's Naughty Campaign, Robot Rumble and Hive Defence.  Beetroot Studios brings you: Ore Gobbler.

This game is a submission to Universities of Hull Three Thing Game Jam. The three word that our game is based on are:

Turkeys -  You are a Turkey

Ghosts -  Watch out for fallen fellow miners

Sparklers - Created, sold and used for self defence
